faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answer common questions simply. Remove doubts about pricing, setup, or features.

cost.question: How much does it cost to get started?
cost.answer: Our plans start from AED 1,500/month with a one-time setup fee of AED 10,000. We also offer a 14-day free trial so you can test the system risk-free. No hidden fees!

setup.question: How long does setup take?
setup.answer: Setup takes just 5 minutes! Upload your contacts, choose your AI voice, and you‚Äôre ready. We provide free onboarding for the best results.

natural.question: Does the AI sound natural?
natural.answer: Yes! Our advanced voice synthesis sounds completely human. 99% of prospects can‚Äôt tell they‚Äôre talking to AI. You can even clone your own voice for a personal touch.

satisfaction.question: What if I‚Äôm not satisfied?
satisfaction.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you‚Äôre not completely satisfied, we‚Äôll refund you ‚Äî no questions asked. We‚Äôre confident you‚Äôll love the results!

integration.question: Can I integrate with my existing CRM?
integration.answer: Absolutely! We integrate with all major CRMs including Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive, and more. All call data and leads sync automatically to your system.
